name: Game a week: Week 4
description:
After utterly failing week 3 (huge overscoping...) I decided to try out an older idea of mine for this week. Much to my surprise, the idea shows potential and I managed to get something fun out of it, though sometimes a little stressful.

Also, for this week I decided to get some art from opengameart.org, which made my life MUCH easier. However, the little goo monster and puddle were made by me and I have to say I'm quite proud of them. :) (I'm a programmer)
